# UNICODE (2013)

**Category:** Text

## Description
Returns the number (code point) that corresponds to the first character of the text

[Official Documentation](https://support.microsoft.com//en-us/office/unicode-function-adb74aaa-a2a5-4dde-aff6-966e4e81f16f)
